item.title: Architecture of EMOC
item.description: Architecture of EMOC # Before we dive into the details and functions of some core classes, let’s take a look at the architecture of EMOC. File Structure # After going into the source code directory ’/EMOC/src’, users can see Class Diagram #

item.title: Individual
item.description: Individual Class # File position: /EMOC/src/core/individual.h and /EMOC/src/core/individual.cpp class Individual (dec_num: int, obj_num: int): The class for each solution in optimization results. .emoc_doc_table_title{ background-color:#F0F7FA; } .emoc_doc_table_content{ background-color:#FFFFFF; } Parameter: dec_num:&nbsp &nbsp the dimension of decision variable dec_num:&nbsp &nbsp the dimension of decision variable dec_num:&nbsp &nbsp the dimension of decision variable dec_num:&nbsp &nbsp the dimension of decision ethe dimension of decision ethe dimension of decision eecision eecision eecision eethe dimension of decision ethe dimension of decision eecision eecision eecision e Parameter: dec_num:&nbsp &nbsp the dimension of decision variable dec_num:&nbsp &nbsp the dimension of decision variable dec_num:&nbsp &nbsp the dimension of decision variable dec_num:&nbsp &nbsp the dimension of decision e
